Title: Relates to operation of a vessel while under the influence of alcohol or drugs and repeals certain provisions of the navigation law relating thereto
Summary: Provides for the repeal of existing boating while intoxicated laws and replaces them with laws related to operation of a boat while under the influence of alcohol or drugs which closer resemble the existing DWI laws.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the navigation law, the vehicle and traffic law, the criminal procedure law and the penal law, in relation to operation of a vessel while under the influence of alcohol or drugs; and to repeal certain provisions of the navigation law relating thereto
